351,100|339,102|322,115|264,115|206,125|148,127|72,132|62,196|121,200|182,200|202,201|322,201|342,202|442,202|462,203|582,203|602,204|722,204|742,205|842,205|862,206|982,206|1002,207|1082,207|1102,227|1122,207|1142,208|1242,208|1262,209|1382,209|1402,210|1502,210|1522,211|1582,211|1602,231|1642,231|1662,232|1682,232|1702,212|1782,212|1802,213|1902,213|1922,214|1942,214|1953,198|1958,156|1803,128|1759,126|1662,126|1642,125|1522,125|1502,124|1455,124|1391,125|1353,123|1322,123|1320,121|1286,119|1282,123|1262,123|1242,122|1142,122|1132,111|1108,110|1092,111|1082,121|1002,121|982,120|862,120|855,120|714,125|509,144|408,116|382,116|368,105|351,100 306_half-01|306.|Letters|Orders|and|Instructions.|Decem.|1755.
